CustomField.description: This is used to invoke a trigger that updates call log and links lookup fields to connected object. Like searching User_Address__c.fPhone__c records for all that match the Call_Logg__c.ANI__c field then insert that records ID on the call log object.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is used to invoke a trigger that updates call log and links lookup fields to connected object. Like searching User_Address__c.fPhone__c records for all that match the Call_Logg__c.ANI__c field then insert that records ID on the call log object.
CustomField.label: IsUpdated
